custom-meta.meta-value: The simulation setups were initialized with open source tools ( http://github.com/mkuehbach/APTTipCarving). All simulation results are accessible open source ( http://www.zenodo.org/record/1994509). Code for grain boundary tracking as well as relevent data (The original data has been converted in avi video files, which can be directly used for tracking.) that has been used in this study can be found in the repository:( https://github.com/DeepHeisenberg/Object-tracking-in-Al-bicrystal.git).
